rules.natural: Either the Amazon Rainforest is selected as a filming location or filming is completed for the amazon bird migration documentary
If a conflict arises with the major sponsor investor, then the jaguar documentary production continues
Should a conflict arise with the major sponsor investor, then a legal review is triggered for the jaguar documentary
When a legal review is triggered for the jaguar documentary, then the jaguar documentary production does not continue
If alternative funding is found for the jaguar documentary, then a distribution deal is not signed with the national network
Under the condition that a crowdfunding campaign is launched for the jaguar documentary, then a distribution deal is not signed with the national network
Either executive approval is obtained for the jaguar documentary or a public campaign is initiated for the jaguar documentary
Should a public campaign be initiated for the jaguar documentary, then a crowdfunding campaign is launched for the jaguar documentary
If a board meeting is scheduled for the jaguar documentary, then executive approval being obtained for the jaguar documentary results in alternative funding being found for the jaguar documentary
Either a board meeting is scheduled for the jaguar documentary or an emergency funding review is conducted for the jaguar documentary

Provided that an emergency funding review is conducted for the jaguar documentary, then executive approval being obtained for the jaguar documentary leads to alternative funding being found for the jaguar documentary
If the Sahara Desert is selected as a filming location, then the Amazon Rainforest is not selected as a filming location
Either the Sahara Desert is selected as a filming location or the Arctic Tundra is selected as a filming location

Either a contract breach is claimed by the major sponsor or, if it is not the case that either filming is delayed for the jaguar documentary or the Amazon Rainforest is not selected as a filming location, then the jaguar documentary production is cancelled
When the jaguar documentary production is approved, then the film crew is deployed for the jaguar documentary
Under the condition that the film crew is deployed for the jaguar documentary, then research funding is not secured for the jaguar habitat study
Should filming begin for the river ecosystems episode, then editing is completed for the river ecosystems episode
Provided that editing is completed for the river ecosystems episode, then the river ecosystems episode is completed

Should it not be the case that either filming is delayed for the jaguar documentary or the Amazon Rainforest is not selected as a filming location, then the jaguar documentary production is not cancelled

If it is not the case that the Arctic Tundra being selected as a filming location results in the Amazon Rainforest not being selected as a filming location, then a conflict arises with the major sponsor investor

Provided that it is not the case that the Arctic Tundra being selected as a filming location leads to the Amazon Rainforest not being selected as a filming location, then research funding is secured for the jaguar habitat study

If it is not the case that the Arctic Tundra being selected as a filming location causes the Amazon Rainforest not to be selected as a filming location, then the jaguar documentary production is approved

If it is not the case that the jaguar documentary production being approved leads to research funding not being secured for the jaguar habitat study, then a distribution deal is signed with the national network

Should it not be the case that the jaguar documentary production being approved results in research funding not being secured for the jaguar habitat study, then streaming rights are negotiated for the jaguar documentary

If it is not the case that the absence of the jaguar documentary production being approved leading to research funding not being secured for the jaguar habitat study results in streaming rights not being negotiated for the jaguar documentary, then international distribution is secured for the jaguar documentary

Under the condition that it is not the case that the absence of the jaguar documentary production being approved leading to research funding not being secured for the jaguar habitat study causes streaming rights not to be negotiated for the jaguar documentary, then international distribution is not secured for the jaguar documentary
Should filming not be completed for the amazon bird migration documentary, then filming begins for the river ecosystems episode
Provided that filming is not completed for the amazon bird migration documentary, then the river ecosystems episode is not completed
